name: Attuned_Blistering_Cold_D
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%.
power_short_helps: Enhances Accuracy, Damage and Reduces Endurance Cost
